message: Hi Bob, I have the product you're interested in. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. That's the price I'm willing to pay.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. That's the price I'm willing to pay.
I'm not willing to go as low as $90, but I'm willing to compromise at $105. This is the lowest I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $105. I'm willing to meet you at $95. That's the price I'm willing to pay.
I've already compromised a lot, but I'm willing to meet you at $98. This is as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $98, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to meet you at $92. That's the price I'm willing to pay.
I'm not willing to go as low as $92, but I'm willing to meet you at $99. This is my final offer.
